pr_title: Reproduced with integration test and fixed in http module

timeline.message: #370 - reproduced with integration test and fixed in http module

timeline.bodyText: @g4s8 networkEnabled is not enabled anywhere, are you planning to do it in another PR? We need a todo then
timeline.author: olenagerasimova

revised_code.chunk:
diff --git a/src/test/java/com/artipie/http/GroupRepositoryITCase.java b/src/test/java/com/artipie/http/GroupRepositoryITCase.java
index 0410d6f..392a0ac 100644
--- a/src/test/java/com/artipie/http/GroupRepositoryITCase.java
+++ b/src/test/java/com/artipie/http/GroupRepositoryITCase.java

@@ -49,6 +49,9 @@ import org.junit.jupiter.api.condition.EnabledIfSystemProperty;
  * Integration tests for grouped repositories.
  * @since 0.10
  * @checkstyle ClassDataAbstractionCouplingCheck (500 lines)
+ * @todo #370:30min Enable `test.networkEnabled` property for some CI builds.
+ *  Make sure these tests are not failing due to network issues, maybe we should retry
+ *  it to avoid false failures.
  */
 @EnabledIfSystemProperty(named = "test.networkEnabled", matches = "true|yes|on|1")
 final class GroupRepositoryITCase {

timeline.message: #370 - task to enable tests in ci
